main event: A sighting of a round object resembling a silver dollar that appeared to be zig-zagging in the sky was reported at Presque Isle AFB, Maine on September 3, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes,The object was observed at an angle of about 30 degrees above the horizon,The observers were familiar with celestial objects yet still noted the unusual behavior of the object,The conclusion drawn was that the object was likely a light attached to a balloon launched for recording upper winds,This report was part of Project Blue Book, an investigation by the Air Force into UFO sightings.
sighted object: round object resembling a silver dollar
witness description: The witnesses included reliable military personnel from the 23rd Fighter Group.
